message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $7,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is my final offer.  If you're serious about getting this product, I encourage you to accept.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8,250. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
